concise_definition: n. （专有名词）纳瓦兹（常见于人名，如巴基斯坦前总理纳瓦兹·谢里夫）

definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun, primarily used as a given name or surname in South Asian cultures, particularly in Pakistan and India. It is often associated with political figures, such as Nawaz Sharif, former Prime Minister of Pakistan.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个专有名词，主要在南亚文化（尤其是巴基斯坦和印度）中用作人名或姓氏，常与政治人物相关，如巴基斯坦前总理纳瓦兹·谢里夫。
definitions.example_en: Nawaz Sharif served three non-consecutive terms as Prime Minister of Pakistan.
definitions.example_cn: 纳瓦兹·谢里夫曾三次非连续担任巴基斯坦总理。
